featured.text: This became known as “dress-down Friday” or “casual Friday.”
In the early 1990s, many companies allowed their employees to wear casual clothes on Friday (but only on Friday).
19 you turn it in on Friday?

definition.zh_def: 星期五，通常被視為一週的第五天。
definition.en_def: Friday, typically regarded as the fifth day of the week.
definition.example: We always go out for dinner on Friday.
